":"address","name":"wallet","type":"address"},{"indexed":false,"internalType":"uint8","name":"oldTier","type":"uint8"},{"indexed":false,"internalType":"uint8","name":"newTier","type":"uint8"}],"name":"TierUpdated","type":"event"},{"anonymous":false,"inputs":[{"indexed":true,"internalType":"address","name":"oldUpdater","type":"address"},{"indexed":true,"internalType":"address","name":"newUpdater","type":"address"}],"name":"UpdaterChanged","type":"event"},{"inputs":[],"name":"ACTION_BASIC","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint8","name":"","type":"uint8"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[],"name":"ACTION_GOVERN","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint8","name":"","type":"uint8"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[],"name":"ACTION_LEVERAGE","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint8","name":"","type":"uint8"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[],"name":"ACTION_TRADE","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint8","name":"","type":"uint8"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[],"name":"ACTION_WITHDRAW","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint8","name":"","type":"uint8"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[],"name":"MAX_BATCH","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"","type":"uint256"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[],"name":"acceptOwnership","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"wallet","type":"address"},{"internalType":"uint8","name":"actionType","type":"uint8"}],"name":"can","outputs":[{"internalType":"bool","name":"","type":"bool"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[],"name":"cancelOwnershipTransfer","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"wallet","type":"address"}],"name":"deleteTier","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"wallet","type":"address"}],"name":"getTier","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint8","name":"","type":"uint8"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"address[]","name":"wallets","type":"address[]"}],"name":"getTierBatch","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint8[]","name":"result","type":"uint8[]"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[],"name":"owner","outputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"","type":"address"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[],"name":"pendingOwner","outputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"","type":"address"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"candidate","type":"address"}],"name":"proposeOwner","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"wallet","type":"address"},{"internalType":"uint8","name":"tier","type":"uint8"}],"name":"setTier","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"address[]","name":"wallets","type":"address[]"},{"internalType":"uint8[]","name":"newTiers","type":"uint8[]"}],"name":"setTierBatch","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"newUpdater","type":"address"}],"name":"setUpdater","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[],"name":"updater","outputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"","type":"address"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"}],"devdoc":{"details":"All intelligence lives off-chain. This contract only stores and serves tiers. Tier meanings:   0 = Unknown    (new or unclassified wallet)   1 = Restricted (suspicious behaviour detected)   2 = Standard   (normal usage)   3 = Trusted    (stable behaviour over time)   4 = Advanced   (long-term stable history) Roles:   owner   \u2014 may grant/revoke the updater role, and transfer ownership.             Should be a multisig or timelock in production.   updater \u2014 may call setTier, setTierBatch, and deleteTier.             Intended for the off-chain classifier service wallet. Security notes:   - Two-step ownership transfer (prevents bricking via typo).   - Separate updater role: classifier key compromise cannot transfer ownership.   - Explicit deleteTier / reset capability.   - Restricted wallets (Tier 1) are denied ACTION_BASIC and all higher actions.   - Batch size validated against a gas-safe ceiling.   - Zero-address wallet guard on all write paths.   - No ETH handling; no external calls; no reentrancy surface.","kind":"dev","methods":{"can(address,uint8)":{"params":{"actionType":"One of the ACTION_* constants defined above.","wallet":"The wallet address to check."},"returns":{"_0":"True if the wallet's tier permits the action."}},"constructor":{"params":{"initialUpdater":"Address of the off-chain classifier wallet.                       May be address(0) to leave updater unset at deploy time."}},"deleteTier(address)":{"details":"Reverts if the wallet is already unset (tier == 0) to avoid spurious events.","params":{"wallet":"The wallet address to clear."}},"getTier(address)":{"params":{"wallet":"The wallet address to query."},"returns":{"_0":"The tier value (0\u20134). Unregistered wallets return 0 (Unknown)."}},"getTierBatch(address[])":{"params":{"wallets":"Array of wallet addresses to query."},"returns":{"result":" Array of tier values in the same order as input."}},"proposeOwner(address)":{"details":"If a pending candidate already exists they are displaced and an         OwnershipTransferOverwritten event is emitted before the new proposal.","params":{"candidate":"The address being proposed as the next owner."}},"setTier(address,uint8)":{"params":{"tier":"The new tier value (0\u20134).","wallet":"The wallet address to update."}},"setTierBatch(address[],uint8[])":{"params":{"newTiers":"Array of corresponding tier values (each 0\u20134).","wallets":"Array of wallet addresses (max MAX_BATCH)."}},"setUpdater(address)":{"details":"Pass address(0) to revoke the updater role entirely (emergency pause).","params":{"newUpdater":"The address to designate as updater."}}},"stateVariables":{"MAX_BATCH":{"details":"Maximum wallets per batch. Calibrated to ~5 M gas on mainnet.      Increase for L2 deployments where gas limits are much higher."},"tiers":{"details":"wallet address \u2192 tier (0\u20134). Unmapped addresses return 0 (Unknown)."}},"title":"RiskOracle","version":1},"userdoc":{"kind":"user","methods":{"acceptOwnership()":{"notice":"Accept a pending ownership transfer. Must be called by the pending owner."},"can(address,uint8)":{"notice":"Check whether a wallet may perform a given action. Minimum tier required per action type:   ACTION_BASIC    (0) \u2192 Tier 2+  (Unknown and Restricted wallets are blocked)   ACTION_TRADE    (1) \u2192 Tier 2+   ACTION_LEVERAGE (2) \u2192 Tier 3+   ACTION_GOVERN   (3) \u2192 Tier 3+   ACTION_WITHDRAW (4) \u2192 Tier 2+   Unknown action type \u2192 denied (fail-safe)"},"cancelOwnershipTransfer()":{"notice":"Cancel a pending ownership transfer. Can only be called by the current owner."},"deleteTier(address)":{"notice":"Explicitly remove a wallet's tier entry, resetting it to 0 (Unknown)."},"getTier(address)":{"notice":"Get the tier for a single wallet."},"getTierBatch(address[])":{"notice":"Get tiers for multiple wallets in a single call."},"owner()":{"notice":"Current owner \u2014 may manage the updater role and transfer ownership."},"pendingOwner()":{"notice":"Candidate for ownership; must call acceptOwnership() to complete transfer."},"proposeOwner(address)":{"notice":"Propose a new owner. The candidate must call acceptOwnership() to finalise."},"setTier(address,uint8)":{"notice":"Set the tier for a single wallet."},"setTierBatch(address[],uint8[])":{"notice":"Set tiers for multiple wallets in one transaction."},"setUpdater(address)":{"notice":"Grant or rotate the updater role to a new address."},"updater()":{"notice":"Address authorised to push tier updates from the off-chain classifier."}},"notice":"Minimal read-only oracle. Stores wallet risk tiers set by off-chain classifier.","version":1}},"settings":{"compilationTarget":{"src/RiskOracle.sol":"RiskOracle"},"evmVersion":"paris","libraries":{},"metadata":{"bytecodeHash":"ipfs"},"optimizer":{"enabled":true,"runs":200},"remappings":[":forge-std/=lib/forge-std/src/"]},"sources":{"src/RiskOracle.sol":{"keccak256":"0xb88f2888df7fede0cdee80f2441a849e6861a8a060e8aef04e1e938d805db027","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://b386922177801e86bdd72e58f7df3843f4a0b7ca1442372a55c682429f4b46d3","dweb:/ipfs/QmfLU839ZWGVjYGUqRznkhgg6tEpvWsoeeXLAt3ENRkQV8"]}},"version":1}

params.actionType: One of the ACTION_* constants defined above.

returns._0: True if the wallet's tier permits the action.

params.initialUpdater: Address of the off-chain classifier wallet.                       May be address(0) to leave updater unset at deploy time.

deleteTier(address).details: Reverts if the wallet is already unset (tier == 0) to avoid spurious events.

returns._0: The tier value (0–4). Unregistered wallets return 0 (Unknown).

params.wallets: Array of wallet addresses to query.

returns.result: Array of tier values in the same order as input.

proposeOwner(address).details: If a pending candidate already exists they are displaced and an         OwnershipTransferOverwritten event is emitted before the new proposal.

params.candidate: The address being proposed as the next owner.

setUpdater(address).details: Pass address(0) to revoke the updater role entirely (emergency pause).

params.newUpdater: The address to designate as updater.

acceptOwnership().notice: Accept a pending ownership transfer. Must be called by the pending owner.

can(address,uint8).notice: Check whether a wallet may perform a given action. Minimum tier required per action type:   ACTION_BASIC    (0) → Tier 2+  (Unknown and Restricted wallets are blocked)   ACTION_TRADE    (1) → Tier 2+   ACTION_LEVERAGE (2) → Tier 3+   ACTION_GOVERN   (3) → Tier 3+   ACTION_WITHDRAW (4) → Tier 2+   Unknown action type → denied (fail-safe)

cancelOwnershipTransfer().notice: Cancel a pending ownership transfer. Can only be called by the current owner.

deleteTier(address).notice: Explicitly remove a wallet's tier entry, resetting it to 0 (Unknown).

getTier(address).notice: Get the tier for a single wallet.

getTierBatch(address[]).notice: Get tiers for multiple wallets in a single call.

owner().notice: Current owner — may manage the updater role and transfer ownership.

pendingOwner().notice: Candidate for ownership; must call acceptOwnership() to complete transfer.

proposeOwner(address).notice: Propose a new owner. The candidate must call acceptOwnership() to finalise.

setTier(address,uint8).notice: Set the tier for a single wallet.

setTierBatch(address[],uint8[]).notice: Set tiers for multiple wallets in one transaction.

setUpdater(address).notice: Grant or rotate the updater role to a new address.

updater().notice: Address authorised to push tier updates from the off-chain classifier.
